review: I had shoulder dislocation related issues so went to hospital. ********* *** **** ** *** ******. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family and friends. There was no waiting time when we went. It was only 5 minutes. I had surgery. MRI was done outside and I took reports. Doctor was friendly. There is improvement in my health. Physiotherapy was suggested. I have plans to go again.

My relative had consulted the doctor and it was for knee surgery related. ********* *** **** ** ******. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. We had consultation with doctor. Tests was done. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. Surgery was required and it was done somewhere else. Doctor was friendly with us.

Dr. Mahesh Reddy is one doctor who does not believe in surgery straight away. He always gives the patients the alternatives which has helped me a lot. He believes surgery is the lost resort. He always explains your case in detail with lots of patience. In fact  I have known him for almost 12 years.
Very reassuring. Gives clear guidance. Keeps it simple. Very punctual and does not keep us waiting.
